scripts.build: npm run-script antlr & tsc -t ES6 -p tsconfig.json
scripts.full-grammar-build: npm run-script antlr & tsc -t ES6 -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test: npm run-script antlr & ts-mocha --paths -t ES6 -p test/tsconfig.json test/**/*.spec.ts
scripts.test-watch: npm run-script antlr & ts-mocha --paths -t ES6 -p test/tsconfig.json test/**/*.spec.ts -w --watch-extensions ts
scripts.antlr-full: antlr4ts src/grammar/ODataLexer.g4 -o src && antlr4ts -visitor -listener src/grammar/ODataParser.g4 -o src
